title: Finland's leaders call for NATO membership 'without delay' - The Associated Press
content:
1. Finland's leaders call for NATO membership 'without delay'  The Associated Press
  2. Finland to apply to NATO 'without delay' as Russia threatens 'retaliatory steps'  Yahoo News
  3. Finland to apply for Nato membership after Russia's invasion of Ukraine - BBC News  BBC News
  4. The Guardian view on expanding Nato: Putin has only himself to blame  The Guardian
  5. Editorial: Nato may soon welcome Finland and Sweden – another blow for Putin  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: HELSINKI (AP) — Finland’s leaders said Thursday they’re in favor of rapidly applying for NATO membership, paving the way for a historic expansion of the alliance that could deal a serious blow to Russia as its military struggles with its war in Ukraine .
